resources.string: A Flipulator is a real estate investment calculator designed to determine the viability of rehabbing a house to determine profitability. Profitability is determined by using the flat fee and rehab type rehab models.

The Premium version of the Flipulator will allow you to enter more information related to the rehab process. Details include: reserves (property tax, insurance, utilities), sales/mortgage info and closing expenses/market info.

string.name: coming_soon
string.u: Coming soon to the Google Play Store.

resources.string: I am a real estate investor whose mission is to provide easy to use tools for other real estate investors to effectively evaluate properties and maximize profitability. My goals include the expansion of this app that will be available on the App Store and to provide a better user experience. Your donation will help reach my goals and provide a better user experience for you. Please make a donation today.
